PROJECT.NAME: Project Name
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: Instruction how must do your respondent
PROJECT.POINTS: How many points will you give for respondent?
PROJECT.MULTIPLE: Allow for multiple responses from one user

PREVIEW.TITLE: Project preview
PREVIEW.IS_MY_PROJECT: As owner you cannot reply for own project.
PREVIEW.FOLLOW_INSTRUCTIONS: Please follow instructions and make videos
PREVIEW.UPLOAD_VIDEOS: Please upload your videos and tag them.
PREVIEW.GIVE_ME_OPINION: Tell me your opinion about this step.

REMOVE.TITLE: Remove project
REMOVE.QUESTION: Are you sure to remove that project?

ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.PROLOG: To research your project by using this tool you should:
ABOUT.3a: In the absence of a sufficient number of points needed to find people willing to perform the test they should get it. This is done by being a participant in the usability test of one's application and sending the generated data and judgments, then this person gives us credit for a job well done.
ABOUT.3b: If the user account contains the right in its assessment of the number of points to find people willing to perform the test, you can create a new project.
ABOUT.4e: Range of points for respondent, max used points can't be greather than your points
ABOUT.4f: Set configs additional parameters like add comment field, star rating to all steps.
ABOUT.5: After responses preview responses from respondents. Watch videos by using achromatic view and stop to log actions.
ABOUT.6: Get data and and use it to make results.
ABOUT.7: Give points for respondends for help.
